participant_1.background:
I have a stuffed animal that I keep on my bed.
I collect interesting things I find on my couch.
i like to read.
i like to ski.
I enjoy making things for my family.

participant_2.background:
I'm curious about the relationship between humans and animals, and how we can better understand each other.
I played video games to pass the time on my last vacation.
I play for my family.
I look at my collection of mermaid books and imagine swimming with them.
I get along with my family well.

content.text: Hello! I'm glad to meet you. What are your interests?
Hello! I'm interested in how humans and animals interact, and how we can better understand each other.
That's a great interest! I have always been interested in animals, too. When I was younger, I had a stuffed animal that I kept on my bed.
I'm not surprised! Animals are so interesting. I love to look at my collection of mermaid books and imagine swimming with them.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I have always been a good swimmer, but I've never imagined swimming with mermaids.
You should give it a try! It's a lot of fun to use your imagination.
I might have to try that! I'm also interested in reading. What are some of your favorite books?
I love to read anything about animals, but I also enjoy reading fiction. I just finished reading a book about a group of mermaids who were trying to save their ocean.
That sounds like a great book! I'm a big fan of fiction, too. I just finished reading a book about a group of people who were trying to save the world from a virus.
That sounds like a really interesting book! I love books about saving the world.
I'm glad to hear you think so! I'm always looking for new books to read.
Me too! I love to read, and I always have a book on my nightstand.
That's great! I'm glad to meet someone who loves to read as much as I do.
Me too! I think reading is one of the best ways to learn about the world and to escape from reality.
I agree! I love being able to immerse myself in a book and forget about everything else.
Me too! I love being able to forget about my problems and just enjoy a good story.
